resources.string: Device is not connected to internet. In order to use this App in full, your device needs to be connected to the internet.
Password needs to be at least 8 characters long.
First letter in your password must be uppercase letter.
Last letter in your password must be uppercase letter.
Password needs to be at least 8 characters long, first and last letter in your password must be uppercase letter.
There was some kind of error (i.e. check your internet connection), while fetching locations.
